tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE therapy_billing (
  therapy_billing_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id UUID NOT NULL,
  therapist_id UUID NOT NULL,
  service_date DATE NOT NULL,
  service_cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE therapy_invoices (
    invoice_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    service_id INT,
    invoice_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES therapy_clients(client_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (service_id) REFERENCES therapy_services(service_id)
);

CREATE TABLE invoices (
  invoice_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  therapist_id INT,
  invoice_date DATE,
  total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  therapist_id INT,
  service_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME,
  CONSTRAINT fk_clients FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES Clients(client_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_therapists FOREIGN KEY (therapist_id) REFERENCES Therapists(therapist_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_services FOREIGN KEY (service_id) REFERENCES Services(service_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Invoices (
  invoice_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  therapist_id INT,
  service_id INT,
  appointment_id INT,
  invoice_date DATE,
  total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_clients FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES Clients(client_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_therapists FOREIGN KEY (therapist_id) REFERENCES Therapists(therapist_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_services FOREIGN KEY (service_id) REFERENCES Services(service_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_appointments FOREIGN KEY (appointment_id) REFERENCES Appointments(appointment_id)
);
